title: Koppa Mai Chiru Sono Koro Ni
alternative_title: 木っ端舞い散る その頃に ; When the Woodchips Scatter and Dance ; When the Woodchips Fall
status: 木っ端舞い散る その頃に ; When the Woodchips Scatter and Dance ; When the Woodchips Fall
description:
Description :
        Kei Maebara-chan Gets a Job!! 
The bizarre and eerie world of public service, depicted by Ryukishi07, from "Higurashi When They Cry."
In the 13th year of the Heisei era, in the Tokyo Metropolitan Area, Coastal Region. 
Due to the prolonged economic recession, the police force has weakened, and the growing number of disillusioned youth turning to semi-criminal lifestyles has led to a drastic decline in public safety… 
Amidst all this, Kei Maebara begins working at the district office. 
Can he become a respectable public servant? 
(Source: Young Champion)
